alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 3:44AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cherokee, southwestern Gilmer, southeastern Murray, eastern Gordon, western Pickens and northwestern Bartow Counties through 415 AM EST ... At 344 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Adairsville to near Cassville to near Kingston, and moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cartersville, Calhoun, Adairsville, Euharlee, White, Kingston, Plainville, Talking Rock, Cassville, Fairmount, Ranger, Redbud, Folsom, Talmadge, Oakman, Funkhouser, Hinton, Carters, Sonoraville, and Talona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM EST for north central and northwestern Georgia...and until 500 AM EST for northwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Bartow; Cherokee; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Pickens
